name: Motherstone T-Shirt
description: For male & Female, the new cool Motherstone T-shirt available in many sizes and colours

name: Terror Is Over
description:
"Terror Is Over", the last chapter of the trilogy albums about insanity, out in late 2010, is a ten thrilling tracks release which marks an evolution in the band's style and sounds. Pure heavy metal riffed verses and hyper melodic choruses mixed up with neck-breaking headbangable rhythms and face-kicking bridges and breakdowns let Motherstone think that "Terror is Over" is their most personal release.
Although inspired such by metal gods as Metallica, Pantera, Slipknot and Machine Head as by modern melodic rock stars like Alter Bridge and Foo Fighters, Motherstone has developed its own style through the years and is nowadays ready to hit the stages again before releasing something new.

name: Biolence
description: "Biolence", released in June 2008, is a thirteen tracks concept album about the most sad, morbid and famous crimes of the Italian last decades' history. Someone Sitting By You's videoclip, directed by Paolo Marchione, hit some media and is still rotating on Italian's TV music channels. After headlining some shows, performing in some festivals and opening acts of bands such as Infernal Poetry, Dark Lunacy and Exilia, Biolence's promotion has ended in spring 2009 with a European Tour supporting former Iron Maiden's frontman Blaze Bayley.
